orchestrators.name: Conversation Orchestrator
orchestrators.description: Manages multi-turn conversation strategy, context memory, and delegates to goal orchestrator. Tracks conversation state and user intent across turns.

orchestrators.name: Goal Orchestrator
orchestrators.description: Routes to specialized domain agents based on goal classification. Manages subgoal decomposition and agent selection with SLA tracking.

orchestrators.name: Safety & Compliance Orchestrator
orchestrators.description: Enforces PII redaction, content filtering, and escalation policies. Monitors risk scores and ensures regulatory compliance.

agents.name: Billing Explainer
agents.description: Specialized in billing inquiries, payment processing, and account balance explanations. Accesses BSS billing systems and payment gateways.

agents.name: Plan & Lines Manager
agents.description: Handles plan changes, line management, and feature add-ons. Evaluates eligibility and presents personalized plan recommendations.

agents.name: Device Lifecycle
agents.description: Manages device upgrades, trade-ins, orders, and returns. Orchestrates eligibility checks, device catalog queries, and order placement.

agents.name: Activation & Identity
agents.description: Handles device activation, eSIM provisioning, and number porting. Performs identity verification and KYC checks.

agents.name: Network & Outage
agents.description: Diagnoses network issues, reports outages, and provides coverage information. Queries OSS systems and creates service tickets.

agents.name: Home Internet (Fios)
agents.description: Supports home internet services including gateway diagnostics, WiFi management, and technician appointments.

agents.name: Security & Fraud
agents.description: Handles fraud alerts, account takeover detection, and security concerns. Integrates with fraud detection systems.

tools.name: BSS Billing
tools.description: Core billing system API for account balances, invoice details, and billing history. Returns itemized charges and payment history.

tools.name: Payments
tools.description: Payment gateway for processing one-time and recurring payments. Handles payment methods, autopay enrollment, and refunds.

tools.name: Eligibility
tools.description: Checks upgrade eligibility, plan change eligibility, and promotional qualification based on account status and tenure.

tools.name: Device Catalog
tools.description: Product catalog with device specifications, pricing, inventory, and compatibility information.

tools.name: Trade-in
tools.description: Provides instant trade-in valuations based on device condition, model, and market rates.

tools.name: Order API
tools.description: Order management system for creating, tracking, and modifying orders. Handles returns and exchanges.

tools.name: Identity/KYC
tools.description: Identity verification system supporting 2FA, PIN/PUK management, and KYC validation for high-risk transactions.

tools.name: Carrier Port
tools.description: Manages number porting from other carriers. Validates account numbers and initiates port-in requests.

tools.name: OSS Outage
tools.description: Network operations support system for outage detection, ticket creation, and service restoration status.

tools.name: Location Service
tools.description: Geocoding and coverage lookup by ZIP code or address. Returns tower locations and signal strength predictions.

tools.name: Fios Gateway/ONT
tools.description: Remote management of Fios gateway devices. Performs diagnostics, reboots, and WiFi configuration changes.

tools.name: Appointments
tools.description: Technician scheduling system with availability lookup, booking, and rescheduling capabilities.

tools.name: Promotions
tools.description: Real-time promotional engine returning personalized offers based on customer segment and eligibility.

tools.name: Security/Fraud
tools.description: Fraud detection and prevention system. Analyzes transactions for suspicious patterns and blocks unauthorized access.

tools.name: Knowledge: Billing
tools.description: Vector database of billing policies, fee explanations, and account management procedures. Provides context-aware answers.

tools.name: Knowledge: Network/Policies
tools.description: Network troubleshooting guides, policy documents, and feature documentation. Supports natural language queries.
